mapper.insert: insert into INFO(iseq,title,link,content,field,cssquery,itype,id) values((SELECT ifnull(max(iseq), 0) + 1 FROM INFO a), #{title},#{link},#{content},#{field},#{cssQuery},#{itype},#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM INFO WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY ISEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM INFO WHERE ID=#{id} AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY ISEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM INFO WHERE ID=#{id} AND ITYPE='link' ORDER BY ISEQ DESC
